content: st on the the toe is shaped by decreases then grafted needle closed 2 put your darning needle through the first st on the back needle as if to knit and pull round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before marker the yarn through leaving the st on the k2tog k1 sm twice 4 sts decreased needle round 2 k to end work rnds 1 and 2 a total of 4 4 5 6 6 7 8 repeated steps times 20 24 24 28 36 36 40 sts 1 put your darning needle through the first work round 1 a further 2 2 2 2 4 3 4 times st on the front needle as if to knit slip this 12 16 16 20 20 24 24 sts st off the needle 2 put your darning needle through the next cut yarn leaving a long tail to graft the toe st on the front needle as if to purl leaving closed this st on the needle 3 put your darning needle through the first st on the back needle as if to purl slip this st off the needle 4 put your darning needle through the next st on the back needle as if to knit leaving this st on the needle repeat steps 1-4 until one st remaines on each needle then work steps 1 and 3 once more cut yarn and weave in ends the stripes are up to you there is no right or wrong way i did 5 row for each color for the socks pictured they are for my son and i work 70 row to the toe ollie socks 4 ©stitches and wool 2025
